Membership

Join Greystones Sailing Club - Open to sailors of all skill levels, ages, and interests

Membership Information

Greystones Sailing Club is open to sailors of all skill levels, ages, and interests. The club is run on a voluntary basis with fleets including junior and adult dinghy, and keelboat sailing.

Membership Period: Calendar year (January 1st - December 31st)

Adult Membership (2025)

Ordinary
€460
(€414 early bird)
Family
€575
(€517.50 early bird)
Senior (66+ on Jan 1st)
€345
(€310.50 early bird)
Pavilion (Social)€165

Youth Membership (2025)

Junior (Under 18 on May 4th)€175
Student (18-24, full-time)€205

Note: Full-time education verification required for student membership

Application Process

Steps to Join:

  1. 1Complete Online Membership Application Form
  2. 2Obtain two club member proposers (if needed)
  3. 3Await Executive Committee approval
  4. 4Set up Easy Payments Plus account
  5. 5Make membership payment
  6. 6Receive welcome letter and club updates

Club Values:

  • Non-discrimination policy
  • Child safety prioritized
  • Voluntary basis operation
  • Members support club operations

Ready to Join?

For more information or to start your membership application, contact our Membership Secretary

Membership Application FormEmail: membership@gsc.ie
Greystones Sailing Club

Ireland's premier sailing club, established in 1937. Located in the beautiful Greystones Harbor, County Wicklow.
